text: I would say the potato salad goes with
pretty much everything wouldn't you we
have some great recipes for potato salad
in this month's issue of everyday food
in fact we love potato salad so much
that we did a make it your own potato
salad the recipe I'm doing today is the
base recipe with chives lemon and
mayonnaise very simple we have a German
potato salad with bacon red onion dill
and vinegar we have a Caesar a potato
salad with Parmesan cheese romaine and
garlic we have a Mexican potato salad
with corn Chipotle and lime and then we
have a Green Goddess potato salad with
herbs and shallot all extremely
delicious I highly recommend you try at
least three of them to start any of
these recipes you want to cook up three
pounds of red potatoes or white potatoes
in their skins until they're fork-tender
about 20 minutes and then let them cool
before you cut them into 1-inch pieces a
great thing about our make it your own
potato salad is you can vary the flavors
depending on your meal today's is so so
simple though so I'm going to start with
a little bit of mayonnaise 1/2 a cup 1/2
a cup of minced chives you could use
scallions if you couldn't find chives a
teaspoon of finely grated lemon zest
about the zest of one lemon and two
tablespoons of lemon juice 1 tablespoon
2 tablespoons you want to season it with
salt and pepper and then you can season
again at the end and that's it your
potato salad is almost ready to eat then
just add the cut up potatoes and you
have potato salad it's deceptively
simple like it's so simple but so
delicious stir it together you might
want to let this sit for about an hour
for the flavors to absorb I recommend
doing that in the refrigerator so you
don't get food poisoning but you can't
eat it right away
serve this to a crowd
a couple of different variations and
just keep making it and making it making
it because it's so darn delicious and so
easy and so much better than
store-bought hi guys thanks for watching
this video be sure to click here if you
want to subscribe and click over here if
you want to continue watching more great
videos like this
